jobTitle: Sr. Data Scientist - REQ'D - Big Data, Machine Learning, Visualization
jobDescription: Sr. Data Scientist - REQ'D - Big Data, Machine Learning, Visualization  Located in beautiful Berkeley, CA, we are a Data Science as a Service (DSAAS) working with the top healthcare organizations in the U.S. on a national scale (Cigna, Blue Shield, Kaiser, etc). We have doubled our team in the past year and are looking for multiple members to handle our needs. If you have a passion for healthcare, data science, and big data, join us today.
